title: Songs That Go With Your Favorite Champion
body:
What song do you think goes with your favorite champion

For me its  

{{champion:2}} - Man o' War:Sons of Odin

{{champion:30}} - Blue Oyster Cult: Don't Fear The Reaper

replies.body: {{champion:122}} - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J9FImc2LOr8
Honestly if you had not put that i would have reported you for toxic behavior {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SMWi7CLoZ2Q&nohtml5=False

Most likely {{champion:3}}

Dude I was thinking of making the same thread...

For reasons of puns.

{{champion:222}}  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Io3En002wNQ
"Get excited!"

{{champion:76}}  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jKLiU7Hq93w
The sound of the song and the bravado matches her I think, plus there was that bug where Nidalee was massive: http://imgur.com/a/WS4nq

{{champion:21}} - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56EZgZomML8
Sounds like a showdown at sea...

{{champion:150}} - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UUe9rnucPoU
The little growls remind me of him, plus the song goes from mellow to gnarly.

{{champion:136}} - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8t-iFr9q1I8
You know why.
How do you put Ryze in this thread for the sake of puns and NOT link him with I'm Blue?
I left it for you to do.

I'd never heard that Grimes song until seeing it here, I mostly just know her songs that have videos. Anyways, the point is thank you, cause that song rocked! I'm gonna have to listen to that again. It's great for a certain mood. I plan to cuddle to it in a few days.
Yeah it's pretty cool! Sounds like you're a pretty freaky cuddler...

I may well be! :D

I like the animalistic feel to it. The song reminds me of being annoyed or angry and growling and roaring about it, and then being comforted until you're purring and meowing while cuddling happily in someone's arms.
I don't know if you looked into the lyrics, but you're not far off.
Nice Choices...Sorry For Stealing Your Idea :P
Haha don't worry, you didn't steal anything. Lots of genius ideas are developed at the same time by different people. That's clearly what's going on here.

{{champion:35}} 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PHFN7EnXpFo

Fits him so well.
Why?
Because that is the level all the kids would get stuck on and then rage quit
XD

Old {{champion:41}}: Alestorm: You are a pirate
New {{champion:41}}: Alestorm: Captain Morgans Revenge

Though it's not my favourite champion, but I can't find the right things for Viktor, Vel'Koz and Xerath.

{{champion:14}} - Disturbed: Indestructible
